heading_7: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) about E-sim Canada
content_1_heading_7: Can I use Canada prepaid sim and regular sim simultaneously?
content_2_heading_7: Yes, you can use Canada prepaid e-sim and regular sim simultaneously in a single device.
content_3_heading_7: Can I have more than one unlimited data sim Canada?
content_4_heading_7: Yes, you can have more than one unlimited data e-sim for other devices by registering the account from different e-mail addresses.
content_5_heading_7: What is the validity period of a travel e-sim Canada?
content_6_heading_7: The travel e-sim has the validity period of a year from the last date of purchase.
content_7_heading_7: Do I have to activate the data roaming of e-sim cards Canada while travelling?
content_8_heading_7: Yes, you have to activate the data roaming of an e-sim while travelling by switching on the data roaming of e-sim profile. Whereas switch off the data roaming while operating the e-sim in home country.
